query: Who was proclaimed as the Queen Elizabeth II?
answer: The Prince's mother was proclaimed Queen Elizabeth II at the age of 25, when her father, King George VI, died aged 56 on February 6, 1952\.

query: Who did the Prince of Wales get married to ?
answer: The Prince of Wales served as a pilot and commander in the Royal Navy from 1971 to 1976, and in 1981 he married Lady Diana Spencer in one of biggest royal weddings of the century\.

query: How many children did the Prince and Princess of Wales have ?
answer: The Prince and Princess of Wales had two sons, Prince William who was born on June 21, 1982, and Prince Harry who was born on September 15, 1984\.

query: What were the interests of the Prince ?
